name: Space Restaurant
description:
Play Space Restaurant - LD41+Fixes for Ludum Dare voting.
Play Space Restaurant - Post LD41.zip for more fun, but without Ludum Dare voting.
You can also play the HTML5 version on GitLab.

Game Info
Didn't you always want to throw food on people? In this mixture of simulation and shooter you have to manage a space restaurant. You can make your customers happy by shooting the right food on them. If you don't serve them or shoot the wrong food on them, they'll leave and take some of your precious /C/ with you! Try to serve as many customers as possible before running out of /C/.

Version Info

LD41This was the last version before the deadline of Ludum Dare.
LD41+FixesThis version includes various bugfixes (list below). Since bugfixing is allowed after the deadline (see https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/rules) this is the "official" Ludum Dare version of our game.
Post LD41This is the most advanced version, but since this version also includes new features it does not count for the Ludum Dare.

Bugs that were fixed in LD41+Fixes

  • Not every click registered
  • Credit "Punishment" when the wrong order is serverd set to zero
  • Food eating duration fixed at 1 second
  • Food was not removed every time
  • Sometimes no sound was played when eating
  • No customers after a short while
  • Customers getting stuck in each other

New Features in Post LD41

  • Add score counter and display score at the end of each game
  • Add pause menu and game end
  • Add food icons to vending machines
  • Change glass to make it more visible

Source Code
You can find the source code of this project at https://gitlab.com/TeamCK/LD41
